com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2

Class PreferenceControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2.PreferenceControl

  • class PreferenceControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jo√£o on 10/10/2016. This class contains the methods to read and write to preferences. There are the following shared preferences: Strings with name "1", "2" and so on, that are the levels packages solving history. This strings have 20 characters, that are n for unsolved levels and y for solved levels. To check if level 3 of package 4 was solved, get string named "4" from preferences and check the char at index 2 (the third one). Booleans "sound" and "animation", should be true if sound or animations are turned on. Make sure to always call a method to get a value from preferences as those also create the preference if it doesn't exist.

    • Method Detail

      • getPackageHistoryOrMakeIt

        static java.lang.String getPackageHistoryOrMakeIt(android.app.Activity activity,
                                                  int levelPackage)
        Gets the history of beaten levels from preferences, for a certain levels package. If it doesn't exist, creates it. It comes in the form of a string of 20 characters that are n for unbeaten levels and y for beaten levels. To get the first level check char at index 0 and so on.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to an activity to have access to preferences.
        levelPackage - The package which history you want.
        Returns:
        String of 20 characters, y if the level was beaten and n otherwise.

      • setWonGame

        static void setWonGame(android.app.Activity activity,
                       int levelPackage,
                       int level)
        Saves to preferences that a certain level was solved.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to an activity for access to SharedPreferences.
        levelPackage - Of the won level.
        level - Won level.

      • getSoundOnOff

        static boolean getSoundOnOff(android.app.Activity activity)
        Gets from preferences the player's sound preferences.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to an activity to access to preferences.
        Returns:
        True if the sound is turned on, false if turned off.

      • getAnimationOnOff

        static boolean getAnimationOnOff(android.app.Activity activity)
        Gets from preferences the player's animation preferences.
        Parameters:
        activity - Reference to an activity for access to SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        True if animations are turned on, false if turned off.

      • setAnimationOnOff

        static void setAnimationOnOff(android.app.Activity activity,
                              boolean on)
        Saves to the preferences that the user wants the animations on or off.
        Parameters:

        on - True if animations are to be turned on or false if to be turned off.
